entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the morning. Local blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 40.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the evening then clearing. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the evening. Low minus 40. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 54 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
